casebody.data:
Tuesday, December 8, 1992

MERIT DOCKET

92-2440. State ex rel. Dayton Bd. of Edn. v. Court of Appeals, Montgomery Cty., Second Appellate Dist.

In Mandamus and/or Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus and/or prohibition and was considered in a manner prescribed by law. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that said writ be, and the same is hereby, denied, effective December 7, 1992.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
